features: 【Anti-Theft High Quality Metal Material】Doorbell mount is handcrafted by professional designers.made of high-hardness stainless steel and aluminum alloy.relatively stronger than plastic shell products,anti-aging,durable.The anti-theft super upgraded doorbell protection cover will not block the sensors on the doorbell.

【Science Compatible Video Doorbell Design】The Anti-Theft doorbell mount compatible with most brands of Video Doorbells,as Video Doorbell 4 / Video Doorbell 3 / Video Doorbell 2 / Video Doorbell (2020 Release) / Video Doorbell 2021 / Video Doorbell Pro / B-link Video Doorbell. The maximum size of video doorbell shoule be less than height: 5.11in, widht: 2.63in, thickness: 1.77in (Does not include video doorbell)

【Anti-theft safety design】We design this anti-theft doorbell door mount for most video doorbells. doorbell box can 360° fully wrapped video doorbell, keep your video doorbell from being stolen when the door is closed, provide a safe environment for home/office/hotel/Apartment Door Renters doorbell

【No-Drill Doorbell Mount】The doorbell box can be installed on the left or right side of the door, but the door must inward swinging. Put the video doorbell into the case, adjust the fixing clip according to your door thickness, put the bracket on the side of the door, and then fix it by four screws. It does not require drilling doors or walls. very simple

【Top-Class Customer Service】Package Included：1X aluminum alloy video doorbell box, 1X Metal Mounting Bracket and various installation accessories. If for any reason you are not satisfied, please contact us and you will receive a full refund on the spot. Follow your heart and add to your shopping cart!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Anti-Theft Doorbell Mount, All Metal No Need to Drill Compatible with Ring Doorbell Mount

You Can Measuring Your Door Thickness Before Order Compatible with most kind of door NOTE: Suitable for most kind of Anti-theft door, inward opened door, left or right opened door (outward opened door is not suitable) But the thickness of the door must be between 0.59 inches and 2.36 inches.The door gap width must more than 0.06‘’.
Anti-Theft Doorbell Mount is suitable for Home, Rentals, Office Room & Apartment
The Door For Installing The Doorbell Mount Must Open Inwards

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as described
reviews.reviewText: I used the item for the second gen chime door bell. Works exactly as described. Clear instructions are on the box. It’s has styrofoam inserts to hold whatever kind of camera you have in place. Has so serious heft to it so I imagine it’s fairly hard to break

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is easy to assemble and place on the door, glides smoothly when you close your door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's Not Bad
reviews.reviewText: I needed a sturdy metal case because my apartment complex management allows cams but only if we dont use screws, and I was worried the sticky mount would just be pulled off and stolen.Unfortunately, the edges of this door case block some of the visual on each side (I have the Ring 4). This is really annoying because I have no way to see out my front door and i think someone slim could sit on the blocked edge.It seems sturdy. I live in a complex so anyone using tools on my door would be noticed.I both like and dislike that it is a pain in the tookus to get the ring in and out for battery charging. I'm not removing stars for this, but I end up angry with more scratches on the back (and once the slipped screwdriver cut me) every time I try to get the Ring in and out for charging.Overall, I'd buy this one again if I couldn't find any other metal ones that didn't require screws or sticky stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Doorbell Security with Excellent Seller Support
reviews.reviewText: The Bleu Clair Anti-Theft Doorbell Mount has been an okay addition to my home security setup.What truly stood out was the seller's professionalism and responsiveness. I initially had a few concerns, but they handled them efficiently and carefully. Their dedication to ensuring customer satisfaction is commendable. They addressed all my queries and confirmed that I was delighted with my purchase.While the mount is functional and does its job adequately, the standout feature is the seller's commitment to its customers. Knowing they're responsive and professional, ready to handle any concerns, makes this product a reliable choice for bolstering doorbell security.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as described
reviews.reviewText: Works as described and nice to have over having to drill holes. Secure fit and prevents being stolen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift. Extra special they also sell a mount that doesn’t require any tools. Of course the Ring doorbell can be a lifesaver. We have 3 of them for 6 years now and haven’t had any problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly with Blink video doorbell. The mount is all metal, ideal for ensuring it can not be damaged or stolen easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great with one modification
reviews.reviewText: Taking it apart every 2 months or so to charge the unit is eliminated buy clipping a bit off the back. Now it's perfect 🥰
No daña la puerta y el mecanismo es perfecto para que nadie pueda tomar la cámara por fuera.Mi cámara está muy segura

reviews.reviewTitle: Easiest way for no drill doorbell
reviews.reviewText: After checking couple different doorbell mount online - This is prob the easiest way without any tools needed for doorbells.Highly recommended
Prevents thieves from tampering your video doorbell. Neighbors who passes by gives a glance but nobody dares to touch it. It's string & sturdy. Love the fact that no drilling is required.
